section.name: Subject
section.definition: The investigated experimental subject (animal or person). May contain the Cell and Preparation sections as subsections.

property.name: Comment
property.definition: A general comment on a specific subject.

property.name: Species
property.definition: The scientific name of the species e.g. Apis mellifera, Homo sapiens.

property.name: Genus
property.definition: The Genus of the studied subject.

property.name: TrivialName
property.definition: The trivial name of the species like Honeybee, Human.

property.name: Birthday
property.definition: The birthday. Age can be inferred from the date of recording.

property.name: Age
property.definition: The age of the subject since birth. E.g. P19, or 5 days.

property.name: Strain
property.definition: The strain the subject was taken from. E.g. a specific genetic variation etc.

property.name: Population
property.definition: The population this subject is offspring of. This may be the bee hive, the ant colony, etc.

property.name: Label
property.definition: If the subject has been labeled in a specific way. The label can be described here.

property.name: HealthStatus
property.definition: Information about the health status of this subject.

property.name: DevelopmentalStage
property.definition: The developmental stage of the subject. E.g. "embryonal", "adult", "larval" etc.

property.name: ConactInformation
property.definition: How to get in contact with this subject.

property.name: Size
property.definition: The size of the subject. This value may be used context dependent. Size could be length for a fish, height for a human subject, or shoulder height for a horse etc...
